posts.title: Samurai Sword Umbrella
posts.content: Defend your honor, family, and most importantly your outfit  from the rain with the samurai sword umbrella safely in your kung-fu grip. The umbrella boasts a long Japanese sword handle to improve handling and comes with a cool sheath for convenient transport.

posts.title: Jeep Hammock
posts.content: Convert your trusty vehicle into a mobile hangout spot using this hammock for Jeeps. Capable of holding up to 350 pounds, this saltwater resistant cover installs in minutes and can be used as either a place to sit or store stuff when the top is down.

posts.title: Nebula WiFi Wireless Smart Projector
posts.content: Transform the ceiling or any wall in your home into the ideal place to watch a movie using the Nebula WiFi wireless smart projector. It’s equipped with a powerful speaker, provides an incredibly vivid picture up to 100 inches, and runs streaming and media apps flawlessly.

posts.title: A/C Outlet Portable Charger
posts.content: Powering your devices when you’re on-the-go is more convenient than ever with this A/C outlet portable charger from Jackery. It comes with a standard USB and USB-C port along with a formidable 28,000 mAh battery and weighs only 1.5 pounds.

posts.title: Bubble Backpack Pet Carrier
posts.content: Ensure your furry little friend gets a first-class view of their surroundings as you take them around town in this bubble backpack pet carrier. The ergonomic design leaves your hands free at all times and features a small bubble dome your pet can peek through.

posts.title: CULER Portable Air Cooler
posts.content: Beat the heat on hot summer days by keeping yourself nice and cool using this portable air cooler from Culer. It features a simple design that requires no pads to clean, replace or treat with chemicals, and can provide up to 10 hours of cooling with just 1 gallon of water.

posts.title: Conversation Starter Cards Set
posts.content: Get your party guests socializing without any alcohol by using this conversation starter cards set. This best selling product comes with 135 thought-provoking questions and topics – politics excluded – that are designed to get everyone mingling with one another.

posts.title: Gourmet Dog Food Seasoning
posts.content: Throw your canine companion a bone come mealtime by drastically improving the flavor of their food with this gourmet dog food seasoning. It’s made using local and organic ingredients and available in savory flavors like “barkin’ bbq”, “bae’con and eggs”, and “pizza”.

posts.title: LED Balloons
posts.content: Create a festive ambiance in any part of your home with these vibrant LED balloons. Each pack comes with 15 color balloons with a built-in LED that begins flashing once you pull the tab and will remain lit for up to 15 hours – making them perfect for any party.

posts.title: Programmable LED Gaming Keyboard
posts.content: Level up your PC with the programmable LED gaming keyboard. Multicolor per-key backlighting allows you to customize the entire keyboard with a specific color motif and features on-board memory so you can take your lighting settings with you on the go.

posts.title: Vintage Playing Cards
posts.content: Give your poker nights a wild west feel to it by playing with the vintage playing cards. Each card in this unique deck is distressed in order to achieve a vintage look that’ll make everyone think you picked them up at the general store in the year 1870.

posts.title: Lightning Reaction Shocking Game
posts.content: The lightning reaction shocking game is the electrifyingly fun game that puts your reflexes to the ultimate test. Players simultaneously hold onto the handles and wait for the light to turn green – the last one to press the trigger on their handle gets shocked!
